content:
That's a great idea! Going back to a place you've been to before can be a great option, especially if you know and love the atmosphere and food. It's always nice to have a reliable spot that you can count on to deliver a great experience.

Plus, since you've been there with your parents, you might have a special connection to the place, and it could be fun to share that experience with your friends. You can also use your previous visit as a reference point to recommend dishes or drinks to your friends, which can be helpful if they're unsure what to order.

Additionally, going back to a familiar spot can also take some of the pressure off of trying to find a new place that might not live up to your expectations. You already know what to expect, and you can focus on enjoying the company of your friends and the experience itself.

That being said, if you're still feeling adventurous and want to try something new, you could always ask your friends if they have any recommendations or if they'd be up for trying a new spot with you. It's always fun to explore new places and experiences with friends!

What do you think? Are you leaning more towards going back to the familiar spot or trying something new with your friends?
